node.title: Life Commandments for Daily Living
node.description:
Every one of us has certain “life commandments” we live by. Some people know they have them and others don’t. Once you define the life commandments you live by and focus on making them a priority in your life, your life will be much richer and fuller. You will be more productive and live a much more balanced life. In this seminar I will share the three life commandments that guide my daily decisions, influence my actions and impact my entire life. Each participant will receive my “Life Commandment” inventory analysis to help you define and craft your own “Life Commandments” so you can live the abundant life that Christ Himself offers.

Objectives:

1. Discuss the value and importance of having intentionally defined ‘life commandments’.

2. Identify the three life commandments that should guide our daily decisions.

3. Demonstrate how living by these commandments leads to a richer, fuller, more productive life, and can subsequently lead to increased positive outcomes for your patients.
